Pledgie Donations

This is the personal homepage of Elad Meidar, a web developer and an entrepreneur specializing in Ruby on Rails. I am a proud member of RailsBridge, Helping new Rails developers get into our world and also contributed a few Patches to the Ruby on Rails core.

I hang around Fort Lauderdale, FL and Tel-Aviv in Israel, and i am currently running Nautilus6 so Feel free to contact me regarding projects :).

Bag O' Links - 26/4/2009 26/04/2009 Another post [Elad Meidar]
  • Flashy link intros with jQuery – nice, but yet annoying… do it only if you really have the gift of doing non-annoying animations.
  • JScroolPane plugin for JQuery – Control your scroll bars again.
  • Phusion Passenger 2.2.2 released – when i’m rich, these guys will get a serious donation.
  • Mysql: InnoDB vs. MyISAM – what are those freaky names? choosing the right storage engine is important enough for everyone would read about it.
  • SSH configuration tips – Remote controls for geeks.
  • Rack 1.0.0 is up – i REALLY need to read about it.
  • Rails on Rack – no excuses :).
  • Tiny JQuery plugins – less than 4k. WIN.
